org.drombler.commons.action.context

Class AbstractActiveContextSensitiveToggleActionListener<T,E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drombler.commons.action.AbstractActionListener<E>
      • org.drombler.commons.action.AbstractToggleActionListener<E>
        • org.drombler.commons.action.context.AbstractActiveContextSensitiveToggleActionListener<T,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the action command
    E - the type of the action event
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, org.drombler.commons.action.ActionListener<E>, org.drombler.commons.action.ToggleActionListener<E>, ActiveContextSensitive, org.softsmithy.lib.beans.Bean

    public abstract class AbstractActiveContextSensitiveToggleActionListener<T,E>
extends org.drombler.commons.action.AbstractToggleActionListener<E>
implements ActiveContextSensitive, AutoCloseable
    A base class for ActiveContextSensitive ToggleActionListeners.

      • contextChanged

        protected abstract void contextChanged(ContextEvent<T> event)
        The callback method which gets called when the content for the action command type in the active context changes. To get the latest content use something like: T myActionCommand = getActiveContext().find(contextEvent.getType());
        Parameters:
        event - the context event

      • close

        Specified by:
